name: Heating Up!
description:
This is a game made in p5js with the prompt Hide and Seek!

Heating Up is a unique take on asteroids, navigating your ship in the shade to stay cool in this infinitely playable arcade style game!

Built for the "Hide and Seek" prompt for Tiny Games and restricted to just 3 types of input! Enjoy!
